title: Pamela for Skype Professional 4.9.0.56 + patcher
description:
How to use the patcher:

Step 1. QUIT SKYPE if it's running *completely*
Step 2. install Pamela
Step 3. copy pamelafix.exe to the 'system' folder where you installed Pamela and run it
Step 4. follow the onscreen instructions
Step 5. enjoy cracked Pamela :)
(Optional) Step 6. remove the two host entries from your hosts file, doesn't really matter, just means you can't access pamela.biz if not.


"pamelafix_nohosts.exe" is the same patcher but it does not modify your host entries, but it doesn't get false positives
to use this one, you need to manually add these entries to your hosts file before you execute it and do as the steps above say
127.0.0.1 www.pamela.biz
127.0.0.1 pamela.biz


(pamelafix.exe scan) false positives due to hosts file modification... https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/00d24566cb1faed60b08300e6ebc9f117e6bc2f14417048d719985d487795e99/analysis/

(pamelafix_hohosts.exe scan) https://www.virustotal.com/en/file/185f2ec8d53924800d84c4960a928fef35d419bfae05a47150b4a3a8efddd50f/analysis/

Enjoy~! :3


----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Pamela Professional is the ultimate Skype add-on application which adds a wealth of functionality to your Skype.

Pamela Professional is suited for the occasional Skype user as well as heavy Skype users. Pamela Professional is very easy to use.

The Professional edition is the product which contains the most features of all Pamela editions
